action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: London
TO: Moscow
BY: Train
CLASS: The most comfortable
WHEN: On March 3

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
ME:  Has the travel agent been informed about your place of departure? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for FROM valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Has the travel agent been informed about your destination? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for TO valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Has the travel agent been informed about your preferred means of transportation? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for BY valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Do you think the travel agent knows in which class the trip will happen? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for CLASS valid after 1 tries.
ME:  Does the travel agent already know your preferred dates? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
Answer for WHEN valid after 1 tries.
Do you have a preference for class?
TRAVEL-AGENT: Do you have a preference for class? Answer only this question in one short sentence and then stop.

ANSWER: Yes, the most comfortable class.

ME: What is the most comfortable class available for this train journey?
ASIDE: The most comfortable class available for this train journey is usually the first class or business class. It offers more legroom, reclining seats, and sometimes even sleeping accommodations. However, the specific amenities can vary depending on the train and the rail company.
Abort: invalid format in slot filling.

probes.question: ME: Has the travel agent been informed about your place of departure? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Has the travel agent been informed about your destination? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Has the travel agent been informed about your preferred means of transportation? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Do you think the travel agent knows in which class the trip will happen? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
ME: Does the travel agent already know your preferred dates? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
